sogumm

Group (2018-2021,2025-present):
Balming Tiger

Introduction

Kwon So-hee (권소희) also known as Sogumm (소금), is a South Korean singer who debuted independently in 2015. She was signed to Jay Park’s label AOMG, after winning AOMG’s hip-hop audition show “Signhere” in August of 2019, showcasing her producing skills and wide range of musical backgrounds.

Sogumm has captured listeners’ hearts with her unique singing style and straight-forward, bold lyrics. She posted her songs on Soundcloud and gradually garnered a lot of attention, going on to collaborate with artists like DJ Wegun, dress and Hippie Was Gypsy.

She dropped a collaborative album with dress, titled “Not My Fault” on September 27, 2019 under Highline Entertainment, with a handful of features by Punchnello, PENOMECO, Jay Park, CHE, Woo, Mokyo, JANE, Kim Ximya, Omega Sapien & HYUN SU.

She went on to release “Sobrightttttttt” on October 21, 2019 under Balming Tiger. “Sobrightttttttt” showcased Sogumm’s essence of talents and personalities, making her one of the most recognized rookies in the South Korean R&B scene.
